original_text: But take heed to yourselves: for they shall deliver you up to councils; and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten: and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings for my sake, for a testimony against them.
korean_text: 너희는 스스로 조심하라 사람들이 너희를 공회에 넘겨 주겠고 너희를 회당에서 매질하겠으며 나로 말미암아 너희가 권력자들과 임금들 앞에 서리니 이는 그들에게 증거가 되려 함이라

sentences.original_text: for they shall deliver you up to councils
and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten
and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings
